etymologies: Old English snōd, of unknown origin

definitions: an ornamental hairnet or fabric bag worn over the hair at the back of a woman's head

examples.text: her blonde hair was held in place by a velvet-mesh snood

shortDefinitions: ornamental hairnet or fabric bag worn over hair at back of woman's head

definitions: a ribbon or band worn by unmarried women in Scotland to confine their hair.
shortDefinitions: ribbon or band worn by unmarried women in Scotland

definitions: a wide ring of knitted material worn as a hood or scarf.
shortDefinitions: wide ring of knitted material worn as hood or scarf

definitions: a short line attaching a hook to a main line in sea fishing

examples.text: a bit of silver paper wrapped on the snood often triggers a bite

shortDefinitions: short line attaching hook to main line in sea fishing
